author: felicity
msg: added a comment about head/body separator

author: crafterm
msg: This new class provides a bridge between Logger and OutputStream objects.
It's useful if you have a library that uses an OutputStream or a Writer
destination for output, and you want this to go to a Logger object.
Added test case to validate, and rolled junit version number to be the latest.

author: stas
msg: fix the tainting of @INC (by untaintinig top_dir variable)

author: stas
msg: fix Apache::TestConfig::open_cmd to run properly under -T

author: crafterm
msg: This patch adds a simple toString() method to LEAwareComponentHandler to
make it easier to read what underlying component handler has been used,
and what component it maps to, in the logs.
